data.title: Islamic Branches
data.meta_description:
Deobandi - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Deobandi is a Sunni Islamic revivalist movement that originated in India in response to British colonialism, with the goal of protecting Islamic beliefs and practices from foreign influence.

2. It is centered around the Darul Uloom Deoband Islamic seminary in India, and has since spread globally through organizations promoting Islamic education and values. 

3. Though not a separate Islamic sect, Deobandi follow the teachings of Abu Hanifa and reject practices opposed by early Islamic scholars, condemning modern terrorism despite criticism from other Islamic groups.
